note.p: Baptist minister. Also known as George Sinclair. Regents Park Baptist College, 1861. Minister in the township of Grimsbury, Banbury, Oxfordshire, 1869. Baptist minister without charge, lecturer in scientific subjects, in Islington, 1871; free church minister, Edward Street Chapel, Birmingham, 1881, 1891; in Eastbourne, 1901.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/83/122/24), 1871 (RG10/299/75/14), 1881 (RG11/2953/97/17), 1891 (RG12/2357/40/6), 1901 (RG13/879/14/20)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 16 January 2020)
London, England, Church of England births and baptisms, 1813–1917 (Ancestry.com, accessed 16 January 2020)
Post Office directory of Northamptonshire etc. 1869.

note.term: Darwinism and design; or, Creation by evolution
